item.title: Happy Birthday, Mr. President
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-21-1800-0100-happy-birthday-mr-president.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: : Happy Birthday, Mr. President Date sent: December 21, 2023, 18:00 +0100 To: Emmanuel Macron Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-21-1800-0100-happy-birthday-mr-president.pdf Mr. President, Exactly five years ago to the day, on December 21, 2018, I registered the domain name Macron-Emmanuel.com to launch an unofficial website about you, Mr. President. My intention has always been benevolent.

item.title: Chris Kempczinski, CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is asked if Kevin Ozan‚Äôs departure is related to the criminal RICO case targeting them.
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. Dear Mr. Kempczinski, Is Mr. Ozan‚Äôs departure related to the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and if yes, to which extent is it related? (look at the screenshot üëá to understand) You also mention Mr. Ozan‚Äôs ‚Äúunwavering integrity,‚Äù could you please confirm he reported internally my stern warnings about the crimes McDonald‚Äôs is engaging into? As the CFO, he obviously should have understood McDonald’s Corporation is engaging in money laundering, shouldn’t he?

item.title: Nicolai Tangen and NBIM‚Äôs executives asked who is the anti-money laundering officer at Norges Bank Investment Management
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Date sent: May 2, 2023, 15:29 (Beijing time) Cc: Nicolai Tangen (CEO of NBIM) Cc: Ida Wolden Bache (Governor of Norges Bank), Trond Grande (Deputy CEO of NBIM), Carine Smith Ihenacho (NBIM), Dag Huse (CRO of NBIM) Open letter/communication, submitted via a LinkedIn post, to Nicolai Tangen, CEO of Norges Bank Investment Management corporation, and CC’ed to various executives and the @FBI, in reply to his LinkedIn post whether ‚ÄúCan you spot the dragon?

item.title: Trond Grande and Dag Huse are asked about Carine Smith Ihenacho‚Äôs email address
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Email address of the Chief Compliance Officer Ms. Carine Smith Ihenacho Date sent: April 6, 2023, 23:43 (Beijing time) To: Trond Grande (Deputy CEO of NBIM), Dag Huse (CRO of NBIM) Dear Messrs. Grande and Huse, My name is [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY (note: but I of course gave them my real name)]. I attach a scan of my expired passport and my current Chinese driver‚Äôs license.

item.title: I tell the FBI that I want to help them understand one of the biggest frauds in history, the frauds committed by McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and their accomplices
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-07_1334_0800_fbi_I_want_to_help_you_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Mr. Rogalski, I want to help you understand one of the biggest fraud in history Date sent: February 7, 2023 at 13:34 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department) Cc: Edward Lehman Note: since Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski told me on 2021-09-20 that he was ‚Äúone of the FBI representatives,‚Äù I assume that this communication was transfered to the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI).

item.title: French Minister of Justice Nicole Belloubet formally notified of forgery and use of forged documents at the Versailles Court
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-10-23_2006_0800_belloubet_notifiee_mcdonalds_faux_et_usage_de_faux_baj_tgi_versailles_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Forgery and use of forged documents at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court? Date sent: October 23, 2018, at 20:06 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Nicole Belloubet On October 23, 2018, at 20:06, I formally notified French Minister of Justice Nicole Belloubet about the grave incident at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court. This office had intentionally altered a date to unjustly dismiss my appeal against McDonald’s France and one of their accomplices, thus committing a serious crime under French law.

item.title: FORMAL NOTICE to McDonald‚Äôs executives, including future CEO Chris Kempczinski, about the illegality of the McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: FORMAL NOTICE : ILLEGAL LOTTERY USA Date sent: February 14, 2017, 23:21 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski, Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>, Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Deborah Wahl <Deborah.Wahl@us.mcd.com> THIS EMAIL CONTAINS WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE VERY IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION. DON‚ÄôT DISREGARD IT! Dear Sir or Madam, This a formal notice to warn you that your McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States actually qualifies, to the best of my knowledge, as an illegal lottery!

item.title: Email to McDonald‚Äôs executives asking them to stop the ongoing McDonald‚Äôs Monopoly fraud immediately
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: STOP THE FRAUD NOW! Unfair Commercial Practices Act EU LAW Date sentÔºö2015-10-21 14:20 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Steve Easterbrook Cc: Robert Gibbs (Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com), Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Kevin Ozan <Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com>, Jim Sappington (Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com), Mike Andres <Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com>, Nawfal Trabelsi (Nawfal.Trabelsi@fr.mcd.com), Isabelle Kuster (Isabelle.Kuster@fr.mcd.com), Alexis Bourdon (Alexis.Bourdon@fr.mcd.com), Hubert Mongon (Hubert.Mongon@fr.mcd.com), Christophe Chapuis (Christophe.Chapuis@fr.mcd.com), Xavier Royaux (Xavier.Royaux@fr.mcd.com), Fran√ßoise de Borda (Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com) Dear Ms. Santona and dear Mr. Easterbrook, I know you people must be very busy executives but I beg you to please take 5 minutes to read this page and the part about misleading omissions :
